Name: Badge - Disorder Mimic
Description: After obtaining, you can enter the Personal Space > Badge editing interface to set up the badge wall.
Description2:
"Warning: Core malfunction. Void sequence initiated."
What's been corrupted is not only the Mimetic Core, but also the once-unyielding battle will. The armor has fallen into disorder, its radiance twisted, its reason shattered. Now, it protects no one. It roars only for destruction.
